page.title: 09 Law and Order E.K.
page.content:
We did a survey on{crime}at the Greenhills shops. we questioned 24 people and these are the results. {Yes }No Does unemployment cause crime in East Kilbride?{ 71%}29% Do you think Police do a good enough job? {63%}37% Do you think the vandals vandalise when they are young?{70%}30% Do you think it was worth doing up the precinct ? {29%}71% Do you think the parents know what their children get up to?{29%}71% Are you embarrassed to take visitors up to the Greenhills shopping centre? {21%}79%
If more Police were on the beat there would be less vandalism.
